description:
OpenMandriva 24.07 ROME distribution is now available for download with the KDE Plasma 6 desktop environment and Linux kernel 6.10. Here's what else is new!

The post OpenMandriva Lx 24.07 “ROME” Released with KDE Plasma 6.1 and Linux Kernel 6.10 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: OpenMandriva Lx 24.07 “ROME” Released with KDE Plasma 6.1 and Linux Kernel 6.10
